docker-run-to-compose.cardInputDescription: Paste your docker run command below to convert it to a docker-compose.yml service definition.
docker-run-to-compose.cardOutputDescription: Review, copy, or download the generated docker-compose configuration.
docker-run-to-compose.inputPlaceholder: Your docker run command to convert...
docker-run-to-compose.notComposableTitle: These options are not translatable to docker-compose
docker-run-to-compose.notImplementedTitle: These options are not yet implemented and therefore haven't been translated to docker-compose
